#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    long long int n;
    long long int a[100000];
    long long int minsum[100000];
    scanf("%d", &t);
    while(t--){
        scanf("%lld", &n);
        long long int sum = 0;
        for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){
            scanf("%lld", &a[i]);
            sum += a[i];
        }
        minsum[0] = a[0];
        long long int minsubsum = minsum[0];
        for(int i = 1; i < n; i++){
            minsum[i] = min(minsum[i - 1] + a[i], a[i]);
            minsubsum = min(minsubsum, minsum[i]);
        }
        long long int ans = sum - 2 * minsubsum;
        ans = max(sum, ans);
        printf("%lld\n", ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
